value:
$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Ah, Prince Ótr! My deepest apologies
for having kept you waiting so long.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|So, you're back then. Did you do
as I asked?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Yes. Here is Gramr—and here is the
accursed summoner of Askr.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes... I hope you haven't inflicted
any lasting damage. I require the
summoner for my plans.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh? And what are these plans of
yours? Why have you not shared
them with me yet?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Well...Nótt. You see, I appreciate all
that you've done. I plan to ask Fáfnir
for his blessing...and marry you.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Blush|You...you would make me your wife?
Truly, Prince Ótr?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Of course. Why shouldn't I? It ought
to help forge relations between
Niðavellir and Jötunheimr as well.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes, of course! Ohhh... It would
be a dream come true!$k$pIf I might stand beside my love,
Prince Ótr, Jötunheimr's throne
is of little consequence to me.$k$pI will abdicate without a moment's
hesitation, and Dagr may do with
it as she pleases!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|That's very good to hear. Now, I will
take the summoner and the sword
if you don't mind, Nótt.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|Y-yes, of course! Where are we
going to take them?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|I will return to Niðavellir. You,
however, should remain here.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Oh? I have to believe the Askrans
are not far behind me now, desperate
to catch me, no doubt.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|You can handle that sorry lot without
my help, can't you?$k$pWith my brother's blessing, I will send
for you with a formal invitation.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Will you wait until then, my beautiful
bride-to-be? For me?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Blush|O-of course! Leave the Askrans to
me, Prince Ótr! I will prove my worth
and annihilate them—for us!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...Hmph. Is she gone?$k$pGood. Now, keep walking, summoner.$k$pJötunheimr truly does have a fool
for an heir apparent.$k$p$EFace_Smile|They would be better off conquered
by Niðavellir. Let their princesses kill
each other and save us the trouble.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リンハルト,ch17_08_Linhardt_M_Normal,Face|I have to fight in this world too?
Ugh. Fine.$k$p$Sbs1000|
